title: Loading screen errors.
body:
I'm on ethernet with high speed internet, everything else works fine, I get into game twice in a row and it gets stuck at 0%.. after only 2 games I get demoted instantly after the hard work it took to climb back up AFTER I have 8 games with afk's and leavers in a row and my mmr gets tanked.. I don't even know what I'm complaining about anymore there's is just too much shit wrong with this system.. the remake function should be to stop this from happening. If they aren't playing the game why should I lose so much lp because RIOT's system is broken. I don't understand for the life of me how this is fair? I understand everybody's intention is not to instantly go into a game and have to remake but when the client itself has a major problem why should the players suffer? has this happened to anybody else? went from nearly gold to nearly bronze in about a week, now I finally start climbing again and this happens.. feels real bad 

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
